Sequence Information.Peptide Name: 4K (Temporin-1CEc analog, synthetic AMPs, Lys-rich, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature.Author: Ji F, Zhao Y, Jiang F, Shang D. 2022
Literature.Title: Membrane mechanism of temporin-1CEc, an antimicrobial peptide isolated from the skin secretions of Rana chensinensis, and its systemic analogs.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (69.23%) toTemporin-1CEcK: 46%, P: 15%.Chemical modification: C-terminal amidation.Activity: active against Gram- E.coli (MIC > 100 uM),  P.aeruginosa (MIC > 100 uM), E.aerogenes (MIC > 100 uM), E.cloacae (MIC > 100 uM), K.pneumoniae (MIC > 100 uM), Gram+ S.aureus (MIC > 100 uM), B.cereus (MIC > 100 uM), S. lactis (MIC 50 uM), E. faecalis (MIC 50 uM), E.faecium (MIC >100 uM).Structure:  random coil in water and helical in 50% TFE or 30 mM SDS.In vitro toxicity: Human RBC: HC50 >500 uM, little hemo.lytic.
